subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Broncos’ firing of Josh McDaniels, a former assistant to Bill Belichick, proved to sportswriters once again that the brain behind the Patriots’ success has been Belichick’s.
snippet: The Broncos’ firing of Josh McDaniels, a former assistant to Bill Belichick, proved to sportswriters once again that the brain behind the Patriots’ success has been Belichick’s.
